Description: This profile is designed to support planners, providers and stakeholders to plan services, undertake needs assessments and benchmark against similar populations. It brings together available metrics around mental health in pregcy, the postnatal period and babies aged <1 year.
Name: Perinatal Mental Health
Route from landing page to data: Data can be located by clicking on the Green box named 'Start Go to the data' to the right of the introduction.
Sizing Notes: Fingertips data, may be better suited to the mental health family.
